00001 <?php
00003 class Dispatcher{
00004 
00005   const DEBUG = true;     
00006   const DEFAULT_CONTROLLER = 'test';  
00007   const DEFAULT_ACTION     = 'page';  
00009 
00010   private static function error($controller, $action, $params, $msg){
00011     echo "<h1>Error occurred</h1><p>$msg</p>";
00012     if(DEBUG){
00013       echo "
00014       <h2>Routes</h2>
00015         <p>reqiest uri:{$_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']} <br /> script name: {$_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']}</p>
00016         <p>controller: $controller <br /> action: $action </p>";
00017       echo "<h2>Params</h2>";
00018       print_r($params);
00019     }
00020     exit(0);
00021   }
00022 
00024   static function dispatch(){
00025 
00026     /* parse the url */
00027     $__script_path = substr($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], 0, strrpos($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME'], '/')+1);
00028     $__uri = preg_split('/[\/?&]+/', substr($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], strlen($__script_path)));
00029     
00030     /* parse result */
00031     $__controller = $__uri[0] === '' ? self::DEFAULT_CONTROLLER : $__uri[0];
00032     $__controller_obj = ucfirst($__controller).'Controller';
00033     $__action      = $__uri[1] == ''  ? self::DEFAULT_ACTION     : $__uri[1];
00034     $__params      = array_slice($__uri, 2);
00035     
00036     /* dispatch */
00037     
00038     // check if the controller exists
00039     if( !file_exists("controllers/{$__controller}_controller.php") )
00040       self::error($__controller, $__action, $__params,
00041         "No such controller called '$__controller'. ");
00042     
00043     // include the model and the controller
00044     session_start();    
00045     require('db.php');
00046     require('controller.php');
00047     require("controllers/{$__controller}_controller.php");
00048     
00049     // check if the controller object exists
00050     if( !class_exists($__controller_obj) )
00051       self::error($__controller, $__action, $__params,
00052         "$__controller has no class called '$__controller_obj'. ");
00053     
00054     // check if the action exists
00055     if( !method_exists($__controller_obj, $__action) )
00056       self::error($__controller, $__action, $__params,
00057         "$__controller has no action (static method) called '$__action'. ");
00058     
00059     // invoke the action
00060     //$__controller_obj::$__action($__params);  // php 5.3.x or later
00061     call_user_func(array($__controller_obj, $__action), $__params);
00062 
00063   }
00064 };
00065 ?>
